Class DailySaleReport

    DailySaleReport class that stores one day's worth of orders

        public DailySaleReport​(double dailyTotal,
                       double dailyDiscount,
                       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.List<java.lang.Double>> map,
                       java.lang.String date)
        DailySaleReport constructor for reading in past reports from csv, with parameters
        Parameters:
        dailyTotal - double of total revenue in a day
        dailyDiscount - double of total discounts given in said day
        map - Map of String: int with item name as keys, and quantity/revenue of said item sold as values
        date - date of this sales report
